sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_1_CLD.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT name,count(1) AS value , acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY name,acpt_time ) order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time Desc,value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_1.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ count(1) as value /*COUNT*/ FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_1_LV.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT round(a/b*10000,2) FROM (SELECT (SELECT /*COUNT*/ count(1) as value /*COUNT*/ FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$) a,
(SELECT to_number(ACCT_NUM+CABLE_NUM) FROM (SELECT ACCT_NUM,CABLE_NUM FROM NGCS_ST_COMPLAINT_DETAIL ORDER BY OP_TIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM =1) b FROM DUAL )

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_3_CLD.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT phone,name,count(1) AS value,acpt_time FROM (SELECT CALLING_NUM AS phone,a12 AS name, area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT acpt_num AS phone ,SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY phone,name,acpt_time) WHERE value >1 order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time Desc, value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_3.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ count(1) AS value /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT phone, name, count(1) AS value,area_name,acpt_time FROM (SELECT CALLING_NUM AS phone,a12 AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT acpt_num AS phone ,SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) GROUP BY phone, name,area_name,acpt_time) WHERE value > 1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_3_LV.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT round( (decode(b, 0, null, a/b))*100,2 ) FROM (SELECT (SELECT /*COUNT*/ count(1) AS value /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT phone, name, count(1) AS value,area_name,acpt_time FROM (SELECT CALLING_NUM AS phone,a12 AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_REQST_DETAIL WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))
UNION ALL SELECT acpt_num AS phone ,SRV_REQST_TYPE_FULL_NM AS name , area_name ,to_char(to_date(statis_date,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_ARC_DETAIL) GROUP BY phone, name,area_name,acpt_time) WHERE value > 1 $customwhere$) a,
(SELECT /*COUNT*/ count(1) as value /*COUNT*/ FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$) b FROM DUAL )

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_6_CLD.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT name,acpt_time,count(1) AS value FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY name,acpt_time) WHERE value > 500 order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time Desc, value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_63_LV.query

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_ts.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM (( SELECT to_char(to_date(a.statis_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm') time, to_char(to_date(acpt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time, SUBSTR (a.statis_date, 5, 2) mon, a.resp_dept, a.area_Name, a.srv_reqst_type_full_nm NAME, a.WRKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO GDLS, a.statis_date, a.ACPT_CHNL_NM AS NNAME, a.CUST_STARGRD_NM as STARGRO, a.GROUP_NAME1 as GROUPNAME, a.TOTAL_TIME2 as TOTALTIME, a.SMS_FDBK_SATIS_DGR as SATISDGR, a.GROUP_NAME2 as GROUPNAME2, 'tablearc' as tablename, 0 as SRV_REQST_ID FROM ngcs_wf_cmplnts_arc_detail a UNION ALL SELECT to_char(to_date(b.statis_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm') time, to_char(to_date(acpt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time, SUBSTR (b.statis_date, 5, 2) mon, b.team_name resp_dept, b.area_Name, b.a12 NAME, b.WKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO GDLS, b.statis_date, b.ACPT_CHNL_ID_NAME as NNAME, b.CODE_NM as STARGRO, null as GROUPNAME, null as TOTALTIME, null as GROUPNAME2, b.USER_SATISFY as SATISDGR, 'tablereqst' as tablename, b.SRV_REQST_ID as SRV_REQST_ID FROM ngcs_wf_cmplnts_reqst_detail b WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉'))) f LEFT JOIN ZL_SERVICE_REQUEST_NODE t on f.NAME = t.A12 ) WHERE 1=1 $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ MON desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_KHZS_ts_6.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM ( SELECT to_char(to_date(a.statis_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm') time, to_char(to_date(acpt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time, to_char(to_date(acpt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS acpt_time1, SUBSTR (a.statis_date, 5, 2) mon, a.resp_dept, a.area_Name, a.srv_reqst_type_full_nm NAME, a.WRKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO GDLS, a.statis_date, a.ACPT_CHNL_NM AS NNAME FROM ngcs_wf_cmplnts_arc_detail a UNION ALL SELECT to_char(to_date(b.statis_date,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm') time, to_char(to_date(acpt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm') AS acpt_time, to_char(to_date(acpt_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AS acpt_time1, SUBSTR (b.statis_date, 5, 2) mon, b.team_name resp_dept, b.area_Name, b.a12 NAME, b.WKFM_SHOW_SWFTNO GDLS, b.statis_date, b.ACPT_CHNL_ID_NAME as NNAME FROM ngcs_wf_cmplnts_reqst_detail b WHERE (IF_TS='0'AND A02 IN ('移动业务','增值业务','家庭业务','集团业务') OR (A02 = '服务类' AND A03 ='客户投诉')) ) WHERE SUBSTR (statis_date, 1, 4) LIKE EXTRACT (YEAR FROM SYSDATE) $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ MON desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.select: SELECT /*COUNT*/ count(1) as value /*COUNT*/ FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE (name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→手机上网（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→语音通话（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→VOLTE功能（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→多方通话（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→国内漫游（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→国际及港澳台漫游（5G通信）%' ) $customwhere$ order by /*ORDERBY*/ value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_65_MONTH.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT acpt_time AS name ,count(1) AS value FROM ( SELECT * FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE (name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→手机上网（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→语音通话（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→VOLTE功能（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→多方通话（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→国内漫游（5G通信）%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→网络质量→国际及港澳台漫游（5G通信）%' )) where 1=1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY acpt_time order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time, value Desc /*ORDERBY*/

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_66_CLD.query
sqlquery.select:
SELECT /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ FROM( SELECT name,count(1) AS value, acpt_time FROM NGCS_WF_CMPLNTS_COLLECT WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ GROUP BY name ,acpt_time) WHERE (name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→基础服务→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%'
OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→基础套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%费用质疑%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%办理规范%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%业务规则%' OR name LIKE '移动业务→业务营销→流量套餐（5G通信）→%营销宣传%' ) order by /*ORDERBY*/ acpt_time Desc, value Desc /*ORDERBY*/
